feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.101.4
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed unsubscribe all link in Portal sometimes failing (#21703) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed slug not always updating for draft posts (#21691) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 fix Windows bug with the admin file upload widget (#21687) - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🐛 Fixed Istanbul timezone (#21686) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed missing progress indicator when submitting comments - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed minifier for Windows users (#21311) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed scheduled post datepicker marking prior day as selected (#21657) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed words breaking to new line in emails on mobile (#21652) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🐛 Fixed avatar on comment reply form not showing your avatar - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🌐 Updated pt-BR translations (#21636) - Fernanda Thiesen
  • 🌐 Updated Turkish translations in comments.json (#21670) - echobilisim3421
  • 🌐 Added Nepali locale for newsletter.json (#21635) - Sparsh
  • 🌐 Added Arabic locale (#21590) - Mostafa Elsayed Hussin
  • 🌐 Added Hebrew translations (#17056) - Oren Cohen
  • 🌐 Updated Vietnamese translations (#21581) - Duy
  • 🌐 Added Czech translations for newsletter & search (#21516) - Lukas Kocourek
  • 🌐 Added Nepali locale for Ghost (#21552) - Sparsh
  • 🌐 Added pt-BR translations (#21612) - Fernanda Thiesen

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.101.3...v5.101.4

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.101.5
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.101.4...v5.101.5

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.101.6
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed unclear newsletter (un)subscribe modal (#21739) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🐛 Fixed triggering wrong error for invalid client versions - Daniel Lockyer
  • 🌐 Updated Vietnamese translations (#21726) - Đặng Ngọc Quảng
  • 🌐 Bulgarian translation - ongoing updates and fixes (#21719) - Yovko Lambrev

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.101.5...v5.101.6

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.103.0
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed feedback buttons' layout breaking in different languages, in newsletters (#21752) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🔥 Removed UI for AMP (#21762) - Hannah Wolfe

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.101.6...v5.103.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.104.0
entry.content:
• 🔒 Fixed SVG sanitization for staff profile pictures (#21798) - Sag
  • ✨Added custom font support for themes (#21817) - Steve Larson
  • 🎨 Updated Casper to v5.8.1 - Ghost CI
  • 🎨 Updated Source to v1.4.1 - Ghost CI

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.103.0...v5.104.0
